== 1.4.0 / 2007-05-08

* Split from rails_analyzer_tools.
* Added eh methods for compatibility with Logger.
* Added syslog-ng instructions.  Patch by Tom Lianza.
* Fixed require in documentation.  Reported by Gianni Jacklone.
